markdownRemark.excerpt:
So we know that HTML is represents the content and ‘structure’ of our webpage
now it’s time to look into how we make it.
markdownRemark.html:
So we know that HTML is represents the content and ‘structure’ of our webpage now it’s time to look into how we make it.

<p class="welcome">Hello World</p>

frontmatter.title: Lesson 1 - What even is a webpage?
